info.description: These APIs will return a collection of Organizations based on a user's profile security
info.title: Profile

tags.name: Role
tags.description: This API will return a list of Role Levels to which a user is mapped

tags.name: Profit Centers
tags.description: This API will return a list of Aramark Profit Centers to which a user is mapped

tags.name: Districts
tags.description: This API will return a list of Aramark Districts to which a user is mapped

tags.name: Regions
tags.description: This API will return a list of Aramark Regions to which a user is mapped

tags.name: Clients
tags.description: This API will return a list of Clients to which a user is mapped

tags.name: Locations
tags.description: This API will return a list of Aramark Locations to which a user is mapped for a specific App

get.summary: Return a collection of Roles to which a user is mapped

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Email address of user

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search string to find Profit Centers

parameters.name: bypass-cache
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

parameters.name: smoke
parameters.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment.  Only applicable in QA.

200.description: List all Roles to which a user is mapped.

count.description: Number of records returned in request

get.summary: Return a collection of Profit Centers to which a user is mapped

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Email address of user

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search string to find Profit Centers

parameters.name: segment_category
parameters.description: Identifier of different financial groupings

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of result set

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records to be returned in each page of result set

parameters.name: bypass-cache
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

parameters.name: smoke
parameters.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment.  Only applicable in QA.

count.description: Number of records returned in request

size.description: Number of records returned with the result set

get.summary: Return a collection of Locations to which a user is mapped for a specific App

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Email address of user

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: App to get user mappings for

parameters.name: segment_category
parameters.description: Identifier of different financial groupings

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search against Location Name or Value

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of result set

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records to be returned in each page of result set

parameters.name: bypass-cache
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

parameters.name: smoke
parameters.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment.  Only applicable in QA.

200.description: List User Locations mappings for a specific app.

count.description: Number of records returned in request

size.description: Number of records returned with the result set

get.summary: Return a collection of Clients to which a user is mapped

parameters.description: Email address of user

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search string to find Clients

parameters.name: page

parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.

parameters.name: smoke

count.description: Number of records returned in request

size.description: Number of records returned with the result set

profit_center.description: Unique code for a Profit Center, sourced by BIC or MDG

app_id.description: ID of the App the Location mappings apply to

app_name.description: Name of the App the Location mappings apply to

profit_center.description: Unique code for a Profit Center, sourced by BIC or MDG

user_id.description: ID of the User the Location mappings apply to

segment_category.description: Category of Segmentation for the Profit Center

service_type.description: Type of Service for the Location

district.description: Unique code for a Disctrict, sourced by BIC or MDG

region.description: Unique code for a Region, sourced by BIC or MDG

client.description: Unique code for a Clients, sourced by BIC or MDG

role_level.description: Unique code for a level in the Aramark Organization

role_level_number.description: Digit associated with a level in the Aramark Organization
